name: Linen Button-Down Shirt
description: A lightweight and breathable linen shirt, perfect for warm weather. Features a classic button-down collar and relaxed fit.

name: Chambray Shirt
description: A versatile chambray shirt with a slightly textured look. Can be dressed up or down for various occasions.

name: Henley Shirt
description: A comfortable and casual henley shirt with a crew neck and button placket. Great for layering or wearing on its own.

name: Oxford Shirt
description: A more polished and structured oxford shirt with a button-down collar. Ideal for a smart casual look.

name: Flannel Shirt
description: A warm and comfortable flannel shirt, perfect for colder weather. Features a soft brushed texture and relaxed fit.

name: Denim Shirt
description: A stylish and edgy denim shirt with a classic button-down collar. Can be dressed up or down for a variety of looks.

name: Printed Casual Shirt
description: A casual shirt with a fun and eye-catching print. Perfect for adding personality to your outfit.

name: Patterned Casual Shirt
description: A casual shirt with a stylish pattern, such as stripes or checks. Adds a touch of visual interest to your look.

name: Linen Blend Casual Shirt
description: A comfortable and breathable shirt made from a blend of linen and other materials. Offers a balance between style and practicality.

name: Relaxed Fit Casual Shirt
description: A casual shirt with a looser fit for a more relaxed look. Perfect for everyday wear or lounging.
